title: Spoon Repairman
desc:
Post 1086
- Each turn, players must give any card to the next player. (This does not trigger effects which harm you for giving other players cards or forcing other players to draw (ie: Veteran). This effect does not skip anyone's turn.)
- When a player has four-of-a-kind (four of the same numbered cards), they must say "Spoon" in chat. All players must also type "Spoon". The last player to type "Spoon" draws 3 and the Spoon Repairman is removed. You can't delete this message or alter it, it must remain "Spoon" to be valid.
- If players type "Spoon" before they have four-of-a-kind, they draw 3 and the Spoon Repairman is removed.
- If multiple players did not type "Spoon" in response to another player saying it and all players have had their turn, then all Spoon-less players draw 3 and the Spoon Repairman is removed.
